title: Super Tuesday Preview
description: State by state, hour by hour, this is everything you need to know about Super Tuesday — the biggest day of the campaign so far. This episode: political editor Domenico Montanaro and campaign reporters Scott Detrow and Asma Khalid join host and campaign reporter Sam Sanders. Find the team on Twitter @DomenicoNPR, @scottdetrow, @asmamk, @samsanders, or at npr.org/politics. You can email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
